data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Earl of Mansfield cruise from Java Head to The Downs started at 1790-01-10
Ship: Earl Of Mansfield, Voyage: Java Head - Downs Uk, 1st Observer: Brodie Hepworth (Captain), Company: EIC
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
